Yanshosh, Suukie is dead, please put him on the deceased page...
----- Original Message -----
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 3:53 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Thanks

Plintissa backed up some, looking at Suukie, the thing was, that this was
her fault, she killed Suukie when she didn't help him when he didn't want
the help, she shouldn't have listened to him when he said he wanted to fight
alone, and that he wanted her to leave. Plintissa walked outside, Dracona
following her, in a way, Dracona feels she had lost her best friend in
Plintissa, as she was completely silent now.

Off in a distant Matrix, Suukie's spark was looked upon, and the Matrix
believed that he should be sent back, he wasn't ready yet, and the Maximals
needed another hero. A new body was contructed, and Suukie's spark was put
in, and The Artist was born, and he was sent back to Earth...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 16, 2000 3:48 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Happy birthday, Thecode.

::Zardus::

Zardus raises an eyebrow.

"Training?"

Inwardly, Zardus swears. It was in his best interests to keep the maximals
alive. Without the maximals to ally with if needed, he could be attacked by
the predacons, possibly losing to them.

He turns to Liono. "Either way," he says, "Your troops need help. I am
willing to send a few troops over ... as a show of good will."
